intro: Haworthia reinwardtii var. coarctata, commonly known as the narrow-leaved Haworthia, is a compact, slow-growing succulent native to South Africa. It features short, fleshy leaves that are typically dark green with prominent white or light green markings. The plant produces small, star-shaped flowers in shades of yellow or orange during the warmer months. It thrives in well-draining soil and requires minimal water, making it ideal for rock gardens or indoor cultivation. Its unique appearance and low maintenance make it a popular choice among succulent enthusiasts.
